description: Wondering how to make meatballs? This meatball pasta recipe is nutritionally approved, tasty and a breeze to whip up. What more could you want?
name: Beef & Veggie Meatball Pasta Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 Macro free range egg, lightly beaten
1.5 tbs Macro Organic Spanish extra virgin olive oil
1 Macro Organic brown onion, finely chopped
500g Macro Organic tomato, garlic & basil chunky pasta sauce, garlic & basil chunky pasta sauce
1 cup Macro Organic wholewheat pasta spirals
0.5 cup Macro continental parsley leaves (to serve)

recipeInstructions.text: Steam or microwave broccoli until tender. Drain, refresh under cold water, then drain. Place broccoli and carrot in a food processor and process until very finely chopped. Transfer to a large bowl. Add mince, breadcrumbs, egg and herbs, then mix well to combine. Season. Roll level tablespoons of mince mixture into balls.
Heat half the oil in a large saucepan over medium-high heat. Cook meatballs, turning, for 5 minutes or until browned. Remove from pan.

Heat remaining oil in same pan over low heat. Cook onion, stirring, for 5 minutes or until softened. Add sauce and meatballs, then bring to the boil over high heat. Reduce heat to medium and simmer, stirring occasionally, for 10 minutes or until sauce has thickened and meatballs are cooked through.
Meanwhile, cook pasta in boiling, salted water according to packet instructions. Drain. Add pasta to sauce mixture. Season and serve topped with parmesan and parsley.
